title: Just Your Memory (feat. Penny and Sparrow)
lyrics:
Even when everything was gone
Even when I got lonely
I never thought that we were wrong
Even with just your memory
We had it all but you're gone and I've tried

But I'm still hungry



Dancing in your blue dress

Swaying to the music slowly (slowly)

I'm singing and I'm smoking

Even though you hate it you still kiss me (kiss me)



You had to walk away from me

You had to do some thinking

Don't wanna cry each time you leave

I'll probably end up drinking



You had a voice it could drown out the noise

And now it's silent

Now when I walk there's no sound, I don't talk

I just stay quiet



Dancing in your blue dress

Swaying to the music slowly (slowly)

I'm singing and I'm smoking

Even though you hate it you still kiss me (kiss me)



Later in October

Neither of us sober

Laughing

I told you that I loved you

You just sorta smiled and then you kissed me



Even when everything was gone

Even when I got lonely

I never thought that we were wrong

Even with just your memory
